消えてしまえば―
google_translated:
No Berserker
If it disappears-

en_text:
Lancer and Saber are our
only remaining enemies.
jp_text: 残る敵は ランサーとセイバーだけ
google_translated: The remaining enemies are only Lancer and Saber

en_text:
Not to worry. One of the other Masters
will suffice as the human sacrifice.
jp_text:
いけにえの魔術師など
他のマスターを使えば済むことです
google_translated:
Sakai Magician
It is necessary to use other master

en_text:
Of course, since this element will become
the vessel containing the Holy Grail,
jp_text:
もっとも
聖杯の器になる素体ですから―
google_translated:
Best
Because it is an element that will be the Holy Grail

en_text:
In terms of abilities,
this young lady is deal,
jp_text:
能力的には
このお嬢さんが最適ですけど
google_translated:
Capabilities
This lady is the best

en_text:
If the person would make a superior element,
whether or not they can use magic is irrelevant.
jp_text:
素体として優れているのなら
魔術が使えるかどうかは関係ない
google_translated:
If it is excellent as an element
It doesn't matter if magic can be used

en_text:
I believe you will fit the bill
quite nicely... young lady.
jp_text: あなたは役に立ちそうね　フフッ…
google_translated: You will be useful.
